about_the_game:
Welcome to “Digital Miners”, where your skills and knowledge are the keys to unimaginable riches and power. Step into the role of a seasoned miner, exploring a vast world filled with hidden treasures, mysterious mentors, and competitive guilds.


Rich, Dynamic World
Discover a world teeming with valuable resources and hidden secrets. Traverse expansive lands to find the perfect spot to settle. Each plot holds the potential for immense wealth—it's up to you to harness it.

Join a Guild
Whether you're new or just prefer teamwork, joining a guild is a fantastic way to gain easy profits. Collaborate to build impressive structures, set up defenses, and grow stronger together. Cooperation is the key to success.

Dynamic Marketplace
Mining isn't everything; trading is crucial too! Exchange your resources, artifacts, and premium lands. Smart trading and investment strategies can quickly enhance your wealth and expand your empire.



Strategic Resource Management
Mining is just the beginning. Wise management of your resources is essential! Decide the order of your constructions, trading, and reinforcements. Maximize your mining output and economic gains.

Upgrade Your Equipment
To excel in mining, you need superior equipment. Boost your operations with powerful excavators, advanced mining facilities, and more. Every upgrade brings you closer to dominating the mining world. 🚀

Mysterious Mentors
Unlock the secrets of the world with the help of mysterious mentors. They'll guide you through challenging quests, helping you uncover ancient lore and powerful artifacts.


Exciting Community Events!
At Digital Miners, we believe in the power of our community. Experience exciting and frequent events created by our developers, where you can earn incredible rewards. Show off your status as one of the elite Digital Hunters and join in the fun!

name: Digital Miners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Colonize, mine, build, and expand your mineral kingdom! As a Digital Miner, your mission is to uncover the richest resources and hidden treasures in new lands. Rise to power by developing your territory or trading with other players. The path to greatness is yours to choose.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Turkish
